page.title: 20Friday, Aston Clinton School
page.content: At 7.30 the caretaker opens up the school. Then the teachers start to arrive at about 8.00. At 8.40 the children start to arrive. The teacher comes out at 9.00 and blows the whistle and the children go in. When they go into the classroom the register is called and they go into assembly. The Headmaster plays some music and we sing two hymns. Then it is maths groups. We then have playtime and the boys play football or cricket , and the girls just talk. After play it is science we study trees and animals.It is lunch time at 12.00 and we come in at 1.15. It is silent reading until 1.30. Then it is art and craft where woodwork, sewing, pottery and sketching are done. We have last play at 2.30 and when we come in we continue with art and craft. We go home at 3.45.
